Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach.project

Annotation Interface ProjectInfo

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(MODULE) public @interface ProjectInfo
Indicates that the annotated module is a project declaration.

In other words, it transforms an annotated module-info.java compilation unit into a logical project-info.java compilation unit. Usually, this compilation unit's path is: .bach/build/module-info.java.

This annotation declares a set of untargeted nested annotations intended solely for use as a member type in complex annotation type declarations. They cannot be used to annotate anything directly.

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      Returns:
      the name of the project
      Default:
      "*"

    • version

      String version
      Returns:
      the version of the project, defaults to 0-ea
      Default:
      "0-ea"

    • modules

      String[] modules
      An array of paths to module compilation units.
      Returns:
      the module-info.java files to compile, with an empty array for none (effectively skipping compilation of the main code space), or the single-element array ["*"] indicating to find all matching module compilation units
      Default:
      {"*"}

    • modulePaths

      String[] modulePaths
      Returns:
      the module path elements for main modules
      Default:
      {".bach/external-modules"}

    • compileModulesForJavaRelease

      int compileModulesForJavaRelease
      Returns:
      the Java version (release feature number) to compile main modules for
      Default:
      0

    • launchCustomRuntimeImageWithModule

      String launchCustomRuntimeImageWithModule
      Returns:
      the name of the main module, "*" for auto-detect, an empty string for none
      Default:
      "*"

    • features

      Feature[] features
      Returns:
      a set of feature flags
      Default:
      {}

    • tweaks

      ProjectInfo.Tweak[] tweaks
      Returns:
      the additional arguments to be passed on a per-tool basis
      Default:
      {@com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="javac", with={"-encoding", "UTF-8"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", with={"--compress", "2"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", with={"--no-header-files"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", with={"--no-man-pages"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", with={"--strip-debug"})}

    • requires

      String[] requires
      Returns:
      the array of required module names
      Default:
      {}

    • links

      ProjectInfo.Link[] links
      Returns:
      an array of external module links
      Default:
      {}

    • tests

      String[] tests
      Returns:
      the names of the test modules to compile, with an empty array for none (effectively skipping compilation of this space), or the single-element array ["*"] indicating to find all matching module compilation units
      Default:
      {"*"}

    • testModulePaths

      String[] testModulePaths
      Returns:
      the module path patterns for test modules
      Default:
      {".bach/workspace/modules", ".bach/external-modules"}
